img_text: Grant Shapps MP ag.. 19 May 17 v To women who spray-painted my posters 'Fox Hunting Scum' last night, it would have been worth checking in first, as I'm AGAINST fox hunting! 144 t 231 522 reckless monkey @loftymonkey Replying to @grantshapps However Michael Green is pro-hunting, so it can get confusing. 8:10 am 19 May 17 6 Retweets 38 Likes
